description_text:
Hi,

I just installed my pedals as I've only just received my sim rig/cockpit.

The brake and clutch pedal seem to be working ok, but I'm not getting 
any input at all from the throttle. I've checked and rechecked the 
physical connections. I've also tested the brake and clutch pedals in 
the 'throttle' port of the controller, and they register inputs 
correctly, so I don't believe it's an issue with the controller.

I'm connected directly into the USB port of my computer, and not via a 
hub. I've tried restarting, and I've tried calibrating via the Simsonn 
control software, but nothing is working.

I believe it's most likely a faulty load cell in the throttle pedal 
itself. Can you please let me know the best course of action, and 
whether you're able to send out a replacement.

Thanks

Dan James

conversations.body_text: Hi Dan James,    After connecting all three pedals, please unplug and reconnect the USB cable.  Then, click “Offset” in the software to reset the pedal’s initial signal, and perform the calibration test again.  If the issue persists, try swapping the throttle and clutch pedal connections on the control box  to determine whether the problem lies with the throttle pedal itself or the throttle port on the control box.

Hi,

The clutch pedal works when plugged into the 'Throttle' port on the 
control box, so it is not an issue with the control box.

I've run through the offset and calibration processes. The brake and 
clutch pedals register input but the throttle still registers nothing. 
(No movement whatsoever in the Simsonn control software).

I've restarted the computer, the software, and removed and reconnected 
the USB. Everything works except the throttle pedal.

I believe it's probably an issue with the load cell.

Dan
Hi Dan James,  I’ll send you a new throttle load cell tomorrow. You can replace it directly — it won’t affect your warranty.

Thanks - Do you have a rough estimate of delivery date, and are there 
instructions on how to replace it?
Hi Dan James,    We apologize for any inconvenience caused. Here is your shipping tracking link. Your package is expected to arrive around the 7th.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6045998393541
